rules_text:
When Woodland Hag-Ape enters the battlefield, create a Sighting token. [i](It’s a 2/2 colorless Illusion creature with “{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Reveal a Strange card you own from outside the game. You may cast that card this turn.”)[/i] 
Other Strange creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them.
